page.title: 15MANOR HALL
page.content:
Manor Hall is a banqueting hall, where people can book a table for lunch or supper. This information goes into a diary.You have to fill in a form which asks what your name and address is.
They ask what kind of luncheon and also which hall you want. There are two halls, one big and one small. They also ask what date you want it on and your phone number. Our group ate a 3 course meal. A complete luncheon which is a 4 course meal would cost Â£8.60 per person.
For a lunch of 30 they have to have 1 chef,2 waitresses,and one washing up man or woman.
